into the same st or chain-space - stitch count of 1 repeat except for round 1 - repeat these instructions the given number of times - this represents a repeat within a repeat special stitches decrease single_crochet 2 together insert the hook in the next st yo pull up a loop x 2 yo pull through all 3 loops on the hook decrease double_crochet 2 together yo insert the hook in the next st yo pull up a loop yo pull through 2 loops x 2 yo pull through all 3 loops on the hook dc3tog double_crochet 3 together yo insert the hook in the next st yo pull up a loop yo pull through 2 loops x 3 yo pull through all 4 loops on the hook © big splash by yvonne van zijl @bokkyshome 2023 5 fpsc front post single_crochet insert the hook from the front around the back of the post of the indicated st yo pull up a loop yo pull through both loops on the hook fpedc front post extended double_crochet yo insert the hook from the front around the back of the post of the indicated st yo pull up a loop yo pull through 1 loop yo pull through 2 loops x 2 fptr front post triple crochet yo 2 x insert the hook from the front around the back of the post of the indicated st yo pull up a loop yo pull through 2 loops x 3 fpedc2tog front post extended double_crochet 2 together made around 2 stitches yo insert the hook from the front around the back of the post of the next st yo pull up a loop yo pull through 1 loop yo pull through 2 loops x 2 yo pull through all 3 loops on the hook fpedc3tog front post extended double_crochet 3 together made around 3 stitches yo insert the hook from the front around the yo insert the hook in the indicated st yo pull up a loop yo pull through 1 loop yo pull through 2 loops x 2 yo pull through all 3 loops on the hook 3fpedccl 3 front post extended double_crochet
